item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (872 points | 221 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (325 points | 118 comments)
3. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (256 points | 82 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (469 points | 440 comments)
5. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (9 points | discuss)
6. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (59 points | 10 comments)
7. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (51 points | 22 comments)
8. VVVVVV Source Code (225 points | 28 comments)
9. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
10. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (403 points | 315 comments)
11. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (18 points | 3 comments)
12. DuoBook: Generate bilingual stories to learn any language (66 points | 48 comments)
13. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (126 points | 79 comments)
14. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (78 points | 29 comments)
15. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (115 points | 13 comments)
16. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (146 points | 93 comments)
17. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (583 points | 527 comments)
18. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (31 points | 8 comments)
19. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (120 points | 65 comments)
20. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (302 points | 271 comments)
21. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (57 points | 8 comments)
22. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (203 points | 106 comments)
23. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (239 points | 77 comments)
24. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (105 points | 114 comments)
25. Sutton and Barto book implementation (59 points | 9 comments)
26. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (141 points | 47 comments)
27. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (92 points | 48 comments)
28. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (103 points | 44 comments)
29. Loving 21st century gaming like an 18th century furniture expert (9 points | 1 comment)
30. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (184 points | 110 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
